title: Tasty Cheesy Chicken Fritters Recipe
content:
This delicious chicken fritter is super easy to make and taste amazing. You can make this in a few minutes and kids will love this for sure.

 

Chicken Fritters Recipe

Prep time: 5 mins

Cook time: 5 mins

Total time: 10 mins

 

Recipe type: Main

Cuisine: Indian

Serves: 2 servings

 

Ingredients

Cooked Chopped Chicken - 1 cup

Carrot - ¼ cup chopped finely

Capsicum - ¼ cup chopped finely

Egg - 1

All-Purpose Flour / Maida - ½ cup

Cheese - ½ cup grated

Water as needed

Salt to taste

Pepper to taste

Oil - for shallow frying

 

Instructions

Mix all ingredients together.

Heat oil in a pan. Spoon some mix in and cook till golden on both sides.

Serve it hot with ketchup.

recommendations.title: Tasty Chicken Lasagna Recipe
recommendations.content:
Lasagna is quite easy to make but it can feed a crowd. All you need is to make some tomato sauce and white sauce and you are good to go. You can make a huge batch of it and make multiple pans of lasagna and freeze it. You can directly bake frozen lasagna and enjoy on busy weeknights.
